text: Roy G Beaman (born 1938), is a male former boxer who competed for England. ==Boxing career== He represented England in the -57 Kg division at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He made his professional debut on 4 May 1959 and fought in 24 fights until 1962. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:English male boxers Category:Boxers at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people Category:Featherweight boxers
title: Roy Beaman
